Package org.planit.xml.demands

Class UpdateDemands

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.planit.xml.demands.UpdateDemands
  • public class UpdateDemands
extends Object
    This class contains methods to update the Demands object using input values from the XML demands input file.
    Author:
    gman6028

      • escapeSeparator

        private static String escapeSeparator​(String separator)
        Convert regular expression special characters to act like simple strings during String.split() calls
        Parameters:
        separator - raw String separator
        Returns:
        String separator with escape characters added if appropriate

      • initializeDemandsPerTimePeriodAndMode

        private static Map<org.planit.userclass.Mode,​Map<org.planit.time.TimePeriod,​org.planit.demand.MatrixDemand>> initializeDemandsPerTimePeriodAndMode​(Map<Integer,​org.planit.time.TimePeriod> timePeriodMap,
                                                                                                                                                               Map<Integer,​org.planit.userclass.Mode> modeMap,
                                                                                                                                                               int noCentroids)
                                                                                                                                                        throws org.planit.exceptions.PlanItException
        Create the Map of demands for each time period and mode
        Parameters:
        timePeriodMap - Map of time periods
        modeMap - Map of Mode objects
        noCentroids - the number of centroids in the current zoning
        Returns:
        empty Map of demands for each time period
        Throws:
        org.planit.exceptions.PlanItException - thrown if there is an error

      • updateDemandMatrixFromOdMatrix

        private static void updateDemandMatrixFromOdMatrix​(XMLElementOdMatrix odmatrix,
                                                   double pcu,
                                                   org.planit.demand.MatrixDemand matrixDemand,
                                                   org.planit.zoning.Zoning.Zones zones)
                                            throws Exception
        Update the demand matrix object from a generated OD matrix
        Parameters:
        odmatrix - Odmatrix object generated from the input XML
        pcu - number of PCUs for current mode of travel
        matrixDemand - MatrixDemand object to be updated
        zones - zones in the current network
        Throws:
        Exception - thrown if there is an error during processing

      • updateDemandMatrixFromOdRawMatrix

        private static void updateDemandMatrixFromOdRawMatrix​(XMLElementOdRawMatrix odrawmatrix,
                                                      double pcu,
                                                      org.planit.demand.MatrixDemand matrixDemand,
                                                      org.planit.zoning.Zoning.Zones zones)
                                               throws Exception
        Update the demand matrix object from a generated OD raw matrix
        Parameters:
        odrawmatrix - Odrawmatrix object generated from the input XML
        pcu - number of PCUs for current mode of travel
        matrixDemand - MatrixDemand object to be updated
        zones - zones in the current network
        Throws:
        Exception - thrown if the Odrawmatrix cannot be parsed into a square matrix

      • updateDemandMatrixForDifferentSeparators

        private static void updateDemandMatrixForDifferentSeparators​(XMLElementOdRawMatrix.Values values,
                                                             String originSeparator,
                                                             String destinationSeparator,
                                                             double pcu,
                                                             org.planit.demand.MatrixDemand matrixDemand,
                                                             org.planit.zoning.Zoning.Zones zones)
                                                      throws Exception
        Update the demand matrix object from a generated OD raw matrix when origin and destination separators are different
        Parameters:
        values - Values object generated from the input XML
        originSeparator - origin separator character
        destinationSeparator - destination separator character
        pcu - number of PCUs for current mode of travel
        matrixDemand - MatrixDemand object to be updated
        zones - zones in the current network
        Throws:
        Exception - thrown if the Odrawmatrix cannot be parsed into a square matrix

      • updateDemandMatrixForEqualSeparators

        private static void updateDemandMatrixForEqualSeparators​(XMLElementOdRawMatrix.Values values,

                                                         org.planit.zoning.Zoning.Zones zones)

        Parameters:
        values - Values object generated from the input XML
        separator - separator character
        pcu - number of PCUs for current mode of travel
        matrixDemand - MatrixDemand object to be updated
        zones - zones in the current network
        Throws:
        Exception - thrown if the Odrawmatrix cannot be parsed into a square matrix

      • updateMatrixDemand

        private static void updateMatrixDemand​(org.planit.demand.MatrixDemand matrixDemand,
                                       int rowRef,
                                       int colRef,
                                       double pcu,
                                       double demandValue,
                                       org.planit.zoning.Zoning.Zones zones)
        Update the demand matrix object with the input value for the current row and column
        Parameters:
        matrixDemand - the MatrixDemand object to be updated
        rowRef - reference to the row (origin) for the current demand value
        colRef - reference to the column (destination) for the current demand value
        pcu - number of PCUs for current mode of travel
        demandValue - current demand value (in PCU)
        zones - zones in the current network

      • createAndRegisterDemandMatrix

        public static void createAndRegisterDemandMatrix​(org.planit.demand.Demands demands,
                                                 List<XMLElementOdMatrix> oddemands,
                                                 Map<Integer,​org.planit.userclass.Mode> modeMap,
                                                 Map<Integer,​org.planit.time.TimePeriod> timePeriodMap,
                                                 int noCentroids,
                                                 org.planit.zoning.Zoning.Zones zones)
                                          throws Exception
        Creates a MatrixDemand object from a List of Odmatrix objects read in from the XML input file and registers it in the Demands object
        Parameters:
        demands - the PlanIt Demands object to be populated
        oddemands - List of generated Odmatrix objects with data from the XML input file
        modeMap - Map of Mode objects
        timePeriodMap - Map of TimePeriod objects
        noCentroids - the number of centroids in the current zoning
        zones - zones in the current network
        Throws:
        Exception - thrown if there is an error during processing
